Sentencas: The performance and durability for Ni-YSZ and Ni-ScSZ anodes of solid oxide fuel cells were compared between internal steam and CO2 reforming of methane in the carbon deposition conditions.
Titulo: Comparison Between Internal Steam and CO2 Reforming of Methane for Ni-YSZ and Ni-ScSZ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: With a supply of H-2-CO-CO2 mixtures to the anode, the polarization resistance increased with a rise in CO concentrations at 1023 K because of the difficulty of electrochemical oxidation of carbon monoxide.
Titulo: Comparison Between Internal Steam and CO2 Reforming of Methane for Ni-YSZ and Ni-ScSZ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Carbon was produced by the disproportionation of carbon monoxide in CO-CO2 mixture (CO:CO2 = 95:5) at 1023 K, which led to low performance and much degradation of the cells.
Titulo: Comparison Between Internal Steam and CO2 Reforming of Methane for Ni-YSZ and Ni-ScSZ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: In comparison between steam and CO2 reforming of methane, the performance and durability in a gaseous mixture at H2O/CH4 = 0.5 were better than that at CO2/CH4 = 0.5.
Titulo: Comparison Between Internal Steam and CO2 Reforming of Methane for Ni-YSZ and Ni-ScSZ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The durability of the Ni-ScSZ anode was superior to that of the Ni-YSZ anode at 1273 K. Amorphous carbon covered the Ni-YSZ anode surface after power generation, which deactivated the nickel catalyst and inhibited gas diffusion.
Titulo: Comparison Between Internal Steam and CO2 Reforming of Methane for Ni-YSZ and Ni-ScSZ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: However, crystalline graphite with a rod morphology was grown on the Ni-ScSZ anode, which affected the catalytic activity less than amorphous carbon.
Titulo: Comparison Between Internal Steam and CO2 Reforming of Methane for Ni-YSZ and Ni-ScSZ SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The crystallinity and morphology of deposited carbon are important in determining the performance and durability of the cells at low H2O/CH4 and CO2/CH4 ratios.
Titulo: Comparison Between Internal Steam and CO2 Reforming of Methane for Ni-YSZ and Ni-ScSZ SOFC Anodes
